name: Ranger
description: Masters of the wilderness who blend martial prowess with natural magic, specializing in tracking, survival, and combat against chosen enemy types.

resource_systems.name: Stamina
resource_systems.description: Physical energy that powers combat abilities and traversal techniques
resource_systems.regeneration: 1 per 6 seconds, +2 when in natural environments
mechanics: Stamina points are spent to perform special combat maneuvers and traversal techniques
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming stamina over time
Resting in natural environments increases stamina regeneration rate by 300%
Depleted stamina causes penalties to movement speed and attack rate

resource_systems.name: Focus
resource_systems.description: Mental concentration that enhances awareness and precision
resource_systems.regeneration: 1 per minute, additional points gained through successful tracking or hunting
mechanics: Focus can be spent to enhance accuracy of attacks
Can be used to heighten senses for tracking and detection
Acts as a resource for nature magic abilities
Maximum focus increases in familiar terrain

class_mechanics.name: Hunter's Mark
class_mechanics.description: Designate a target for focused hunting and tracking
effects: Marked targets take additional damage from your attacks
Can track marked targets over great distances
Gain insight into marked target's weaknesses
Successful attacks against marked targets restore small amounts of stamina

class_mechanics.name: Natural Explorer
class_mechanics.description: Exceptional skill at navigating and surviving in the wilderness
effects: Increased movement speed in natural environments
Ability to find food, water, and shelter with minimal effort
Resistance to environmental hazards and weather effects
Can identify plants, animals, and other natural features with high accuracy

class_mechanics.name: Favored Enemy
class_mechanics.description: Specialized knowledge and techniques against specific types of creatures
effects: Increased damage against chosen enemy types
Enhanced ability to track and detect favored enemies
Knowledge of favored enemy weaknesses and behaviors
Can learn additional favored enemy types as you level up

skill_trees.name: Hunter
key_abilities: Precise Shot: Carefully aimed attack that targets vital points
Exploit Weakness: Identify and target enemy vulnerabilities
Rapid Fire: Fire multiple arrows in quick succession

skill_trees.name: Tracker
key_abilities: Camouflage: Blend into surroundings to avoid detection
Read Signs: Gather detailed information from tracks and traces
Pathfinder: Find the safest and most efficient route through difficult terrain

skill_trees.name: Beastmaster
key_abilities: Animal Companion: Bond with a wild animal that fights alongside you
Beast Sense: Share senses with nearby animals
Natural Healing: Channel nature's energy to heal wounds

bonuses: Enhanced vision in low light conditions

arch_classes.name: Pathfinder
arch_classes.description: Elite rangers who have mastered the art of wilderness survival and developed a mystical connection with nature itself.
skill_requirements: At least 5 points in any ranger skill tree
Completion of the 'Trial of the Wild' quest

starting_equipment: Two short swords or hunting knives
lore: Rangers are the guardians of the wilderness, skilled hunters and trackers who have learned to survive in the harshest environments. Through years of training and experience, they develop an intimate knowledge of nature's ways and the creatures that dwell within it. While many rangers are solitary figures who prefer the company of animals to people, others serve as guides, scouts, or protectors of settlements bordering wild lands. Their combat style typically emphasizes mobility and precision, using bows for ranged attacks and dual weapons for close combat. Many rangers develop a mystical connection to nature, allowing them to cast minor spells related to animals, plants, and the elements. This connection often manifests in the form of an animal companion—a loyal beast that fights alongside them. Rangers are defined by their adaptability, resourcefulness, and deep respect for the natural world, making them invaluable allies in untamed territories and formidable opponents who use the environment itself as a weapon.
